questions.content: What is the solution to the inequality 2x - 5 > 3?
What is the length of the hypotenuse in a right triangle with legs of length 6 cm and 8 cm?
Find the derivative of f(x) = 5x³ - 2x² + x at x = 1.
Calculate the compound interest on $1000 at a rate of 5% per year, compounded annually for 3 years.
Solve the quadratic equation: x² - 6x + 8 = 0, giving the smallest root.
If sin θ = 0.6, find cos θ for an angle in the first quadrant, rounded to two decimal places.
What is the area of a sector of a circle with radius 10 cm and a central angle of 30°? (Use π ≈ 3.14, round to two decimal places)
